name: Indeed Jobs API - Finland
description:
Indeed Jobs Search API - Finland
Get the Jobs List as JSON by giving Keyword, Location (Finland Only) and offset value.
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.

api_methods.name: SearchJobs
api_methods.description:
offset = 0 (starting of the page, it must be increased by 10 to achieve pagination)
keyword = python (it can be any search keyword for ex: job title or skill title)
location = Helsinki (For now this API gets data for Finland Indeed. You can enter a specific city or state.)
This will provide you with a list of 15 jobs in the page, by default a single page can have a max of 15 jobs posting only. In order to get all the data using pagination you need to keep increasing the count of offset by 10.

You will get the following fields using this API.

'position'
'company_name'
'job_title'
'job_location'
'salary'
'date'
'job_url'
'urgently_hiring'
'multiple_hiring'
'company_rating'
'company_reviews'
'company_review_link'
'company_logo_url'
'page_number'

utterances.utterance: Find the latest software engineer jobs in Espoo starting from the first page.
Show me data analyst positions in Tampere, starting from the second page.
Search for marketing manager roles in Turku, starting from the third page.
Get me the list of graphic designer jobs in Oulu from the fourth page.
Look for project manager opportunities in Vantaa, starting from the fifth page.
Find available nurse positions in Lahti, starting from the sixth page.
Show me the list of electrician jobs in Kuopio from the seventh page.
Search for teacher vacancies in Jyväskylä, starting from the eighth page.
Get me the list of accountant jobs in Rovaniemi from the ninth page.
Look for available chef positions in Pori, starting from the tenth page.
